structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth

law.catch_line: Adoption Of Procedures And Regulations To Implement Secs. 44 To 58
law.text: [ Text of section added by 2012, 165, Sec. 82 effective January 1, 2013. See 2012, 165, Sec. 137.] The board shall independently adopt procedures and regulations as necessary to implement the requirements of sections 44 to 58, inclusive. Such procedures and regulations may vary according to the class of project.
